26710.name: Smashing Toys
26710.description:
Enchanted by a terrible magic, a factory of toys must join a frenzied race to stay alive. They will have to cross industrial parks, funfairs and a forest to reach the promised island of eternal life.

Race for your toy's life - against other players or in single-player mode. Just don't let your vehicle fall apart.

  • Multiplayer Team Fight — Race and compete against opponents to win points and customize your vehicle to win!
  • Breakable Toys — Blow parts off your competitors to earn more points. Hit jumps and collect bonus objects to repair your own toys and vehicles.
  • 3 Different Worlds and 25 Levels — Race in the factory, the funfair and the forest across more than 25 levels in either single-player or multiplayer modes.
